00052 
00053 //
00054 // This is the common KviSelectorInterface
00055 //
00056 //     Note: I'm always learning
00057 //           Today I have discovered that:
00058 //              QObject * o = new KviBoolSelector(...)
00059 //              ((KviSelectorInterface *)o)->commit()
00060 //           Does not work (SIGSEGV when jumping into commit(): bad vtable entry)
00061 //           But the following works fine:
00062 //              KviBoolSelector * b = new KviBoolSelector(...)
00063 //              ((KviSelectorInterface *)b)->commit();
00064 //           Mmmmmh.... the assembler generated by gcc
00065 //           uses two different vtable offsets in the two cases
00066 //           why ?
00067 //
00068 
00069 class KVIRC_API KviSelectorInterface
00070 {
00071 public:
00072         KviSelectorInterface(){};
00073         virtual ~KviSelectorInterface(){};
00074 public:
00075         virtual void commit(){};
00076         virtual QString textForSearch(){return QString();};
00077         virtual QWidget *widgetToHighlight(){return 0;};
00078 };
00079

00081 {
00082         Q_OBJECT

00085         ~KviBoolSelector(){};

00087         bool * m_pOption;
00088 public:
00089         virtual void commit();
00090         QString textForSearch(){return text();};
00091         QWidget *widgetToHighlight(){return (QWidget *)this;};
00092 public slots:
00093         void setNotEnabled(bool bNotEnabled);
00094         void setEnabled(bool bEnabled);
00095 
00096 };

00224 class KVIRC_API KviFileSelector : public QWidget, public KviSelectorInterface
00225 {
00226         Q_OBJECT
00227         Q_PROPERTY(QString tmpFile READ tmpFile WRITE setTmpFile)
00228 public:
00229         KviFileSelector(QWidget * par,const QString & txt,QString * pOption,bool bEnabled,unsigned int uFlags = 0,const QString &szFilter = QString());
00230         ~KviFileSelector(){};
00231 public:
00232         enum Flags {
00233                 ChooseSaveFileName = 1,
00234                 DontConfirmOverwrite = 2,
00235                 VerticalLayout = 4
00236         };

00238         QLabel      * m_pLabel;
00239         QLineEdit   * m_pLineEdit;
00240         QPushButton * m_pButton;

00242         unsigned int  m_uFlags;
00243         QString       m_szFilter;
00244         QGridLayout * m_Layout;
00245 public:
00246         QString tmpFile(){ return m_pLineEdit->text(); };
00247         void setTmpFile(QString & szFile){ m_pLineEdit->setText(szFile); };
00248         virtual void commit();
00249         void setSelection(const QString &szSelection);
00250 signals:
00251         void selectionChanged(const QString &szNewValue);
00252 public slots:
00253         virtual void setEnabled(bool bEnabled);
